LanguageData.S16_Flogger.stages.0.label: 被鞭打S0
LanguageData.S16_Flogger.stages.1.label: 被鞭打S1
LanguageData.S16_Flogger.stages.2.label: 被鞭打S2
LanguageData.S16_Flogger.stages.3.label: 被鞭打S3
LanguageData.S16_Flogger.stages.3.description: *panting*...my buttocks are red as apples... It hurts, but in a pleasant way...
LanguageData.S16_Flogger.stages.4.label: 被鞭打S4
LanguageData.S16_Flogger.stages.4.description: My ass is all streaked. Now it really hurts.
LanguageData.S16_Flogger.stages.5.label: 被鞭打S5
LanguageData.S16_Flogger.stages.5.description: It is so painful... There may be some blood... Have pity on my poor ass...
LanguageData.S16_Flogger.stages.6.label: 被鞭打S6
LanguageData.S16_Flogger.stages.6.description: Ouch! My butt is all red, and I can feel droplets of blood... Ahhh!
LanguageData.S16_Flogger.stages.7.label: 被鞭打S7
LanguageData.S16_Flogger.stages.7.description: My butt is just a mess... all covered with bleeding gashes... I can barely stand from pain... Please, stop it... *crying* I beg you, please...
